hazards.hazards: Musculo-Skeletal Disorders through incorrect techniques including: lifting/putting down.
Harm from ingestion/inhalation of hazardous substances. Harm from contact with skin/eyes. Exposure to Asbestos containing materials.
hazards.controlMeasures: Wear coveralls, protective gloves & safety glasses(as necessary).Secure substances in lockable cabinet to prevent unauthorised access by others. Provide Manufacturers Safety Data Sheets(MSDS's). Read 'Asbestos Containing Materials' Risk Assessment.
If spotted do not handle, wear PPE in high risk areas.

hazards.task: Slips, Trips & Falls at Ground Level
hazards.hazards: Slip, Trip, Fall Hazard from slippery (wet, icy, oily) surfaces, materials, work equipment, uneven surfaces, steps in work area.
hazards.controlMeasures: Clean/Clear work area of hazards or barrier off where hazard still exists. Materials / Tools must be stored away from walkways.
